name: Youth Performing Arts Program
description: The company's Youth Performing Arts Program (YPAP) is a collaborative youth arts education program developed to enhance classroom learning, educating both the mind and the physical body. YPAP was created to integrate our nationally renowned, highly innovative performance work with the life experiences and possibilities of our young Bayview Hunters Point neighbors. For over 30 years, YPAP has served 100-150 children annually by offering free in-school and after-school classes and performance oppo
